mapper.select: select fa.*, pt.name as positionName,u.username as approveName , DATE_FORMAT(fa.handledate,"%Y-%m-%d") AS approveDateStr from flow_approve fa left join t_user u on fa.userid = u.id left join t_position pt on fa.positionid = pt.id where fa.apply_id in (select fu.id from flow_user_application fu where fu.form_id = #{applyId} and fu.apply_type = #{applyType}) ORDER BY fa.id

select COUNT(1) from flow_user_application inner join flow_approve on flow_user_application.id=flow_approve.apply_id AND flow_approve.id in (select MAX(id) from flow_approve GROUP BY apply_id) where user_id=#{userid} and checkstatus=#{checkstatus} and apply_time>= date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 month)
select COUNT(1) from flow_approve where userid=#{userid} AND is_approve=0
SELECT * FROM flow_approve WHERE apply_id = #{applyId} AND id > #{approveId} LIMIT 0,1
